DataElement.preferredName: Skin Past Three Month Problem Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free text field to specify another kind of skin condition a patient has experienced in the last 3 months that is not already specified or mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Skin Past Three Month Other Problem
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body. It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages._Past; before the present time._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: 1. An organ and the enveloping membrane of the body; includes, in addition to the epidermis and dermis, all of the derivatives of the epidermis, e.g., hairs, nails, sudoriferous and sebaceous glands, and mammary glands. Subdivisions of the skin surround various body parts; as a whole, the skin constitutes the external surface of the body. 2. The rind, capsule, or covering of any body or part.

Concepts.definition: An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body. It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages.

Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval by S.Shakour. mc 9/21/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
